Halesworth Library

Manager: Ali Hopkins

Bridge Street, Halesworth
IP19 8AD

Tel: 01986 875095
Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
Friends group: Friends of Halesworth County Library

Branch facilities

  • Accessibility information
  • Payments: cash, cheques and cards accepted
  • Parking: unavailable
  • Out-of-hours book return available
  • Customer toilet
  • Refreshments: Â£1 for a cup of coffee or tea
  • Display space: Window space available to hire for posters and notices. Contact the library for more details.
  • Which? available - ask staff for magazine or to log in
  • For sale: Stamps, cards, artwork, jewellery, books from local authors, reading glasses and accessories from ReadySpex, Halesworth Library bags, bookmarks and pens.

IT and printing facilities

  • Free wifi
  • Book a computer
  • Borrow an iPad
  • Photocopying: available
  • Colour printing: available in A4 only
  • Scan to email
  • Fax
  • Printing, photocopying & scanning charges
